name: No Moustache in Heaven
description:
No Moustache in Heaven is a card game where you must decide the fate of the random characters getting in heaven's door...
Remember, no moustaches allowed in heaven!

This game was made in 48h for the Global Game Jam Bcn 2022:

  • GGJ Bcn 2022 Game Website.
  • GGJ Bcn 2022.
Controls:

Use X/V or click the buttons to choose the destiny of the character.

Team:

Jesús Martínez (programming, game design)
Miguel Ángel Puivecino (art, game design)

Credits and metions:
  • Unity Assets:
    • DOTween (HOTween v2).
  • Music
    • Gates of Heaven Music by TheoTer
